attributes.title: ABSOLUTE HELL
attributes.review: Ok so I downloaded this app because I love American you know but I donâ€™t like Trump and I wanted to keep an open mind tho and see what all the fuss with the Trump supporter was all about but as soon as I opened the app I felt this weird tingling sensation on my skin and I looked down and saw that my hand has begun to turn orange. I screamed in horror and tried to rub it off but it just kept spreading. Then racist and homophobic thoughts began to fill my head. I screamed and clutched and pulled out my hair to try to distract myself from these awful horrid thoughts. I threw my phone so I wouldnâ€™t have to see that god awful screen anymore as it was beginning to burn my eyes and that I had a permanent squint as well. I rushed to my bathroom mirror and saw that my skin was completely orange. I stared at myself in horror and suddenly I had the sudden urge to have sex with children as well. I couldnâ€™t live like this so I grabbed all the bleach I had and poured it all out in my bathtub and bathed in it in hopes my skin would no longer be that disgusting orange shade. I also got a syringe and injected some into my brain. Now this seems to be a temporary fix as the orange skin and the thoughts come back after about two days but the bleach does have some negative effects as I am not mentally disabled. I have to now do this for the rest of my life slowly becoming more and more braindead otherwise Iâ€™d become the female version of trump himself. The world cannot handle two of him it would be absolutely destroyed so please iâ€™m begging you do not download this app.
